target: I'm happy to be of service, and thank you for using the Cambridge TownInfo Centre!
context: <user>  i'm looking for el shaddai <system>  The el shaddai is a guesthouse in the centre area. Would you like to make a booking today? <user>  Yes I would love that. I need to book it starting on Saturday for 4 nights for 4 people. <system>  Great choice! Your booking went through without a hitch. Here is your reference number 9NXGN689 . Can I do anything else for you? <user>  Yes, I need a entrance fee and area <system>  I'm not sure I understand. The El Shaddai is considered a cheap guesthouse in the centre part of town. Were you looking for an attraction? <user>  Yes I am looking for a nightclub. <system>  Would you prefer centre or south area?<user>  It doesn't matter, pick one for me and I'll need the area and entrance fee please. <system>  Club Salsa is a really cool hot spot. They are located in the centre of the city and it's only 5 pounds per person to get in!<user>  Thank you. That is all for now. Thanks for your help. <system>
